headline: Southwest Airlines (LUV): Evaluating Valuation Following Recent Modest Share Price Gains
summary: Southwest Airlines (LUV) shares made modest gains recently, rising about 3% over the past week and 10% in the past year. Investors are watching to see if the positive trend continues following a period of underperformance. See our latest analysis for Southwest Airlines. After lagging the broader market, Southwest Airlines’ recent 1-day share price gain of over 3% is drawing attention and suggests that renewed momentum may be building. Even so, the 1-year total shareholder return sits just...
